verses.verse: Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Where is the bill <S%H5612><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>'s divorce, <S%H3748><s%> with which I have put her away? <S%H7971><s%> or which of my creditors <S%H5383><s%> is it to whom I have sold <S%H4376><s%> you? <S%H5771><s%> Behold, for your iniquities were you sold, <S%H4376><s%> and for your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> was your mother <S%H517><s%> put away. <S%H7971><s%>

Why, <S%H935><s%> when I came, was there no man? <S%H376><s%> when I called, <S%H7121><s%> was there none to answer? <S%H6030><s%> Is my hand <S%H3027><s%> shortened <S%H7114><s%> at all, <S%H7114><s%> that it can't <S%H6304><s%> redeem? or have I no power <S%H3581><s%> to deliver? <S%H5337><s%> Behold, <S%H1606><s%> at my rebuke I dry up <S%H2717><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> I make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> a wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%> stink, <S%H887><s%> because there is no water, <S%H4325><s%> and die <S%H4191><s%> for thirst. <S%H6772><s%>
I clothe <S%H3847><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> with blackness, <S%H6940><s%> and I make <S%H7760><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> their covering. <S%H3682><s%>"

The Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H136><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of those who are taught, <S%H3928><s%> that I may know <S%H3045><s%> how to sustain <S%H5790><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> him who is weary: <S%H3287><s%> he wakens <S%H5782><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> he wakens <S%H5782><s%> my ear <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> as those who are taught. <S%H3928><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> has opened <S%H6605><s%> my ear, <S%H241><s%> and I was not rebellious, <S%H4784><s%> neither turned away <S%H5472><s%> backward. <S%H268><s%>

I gave <S%H5414><s%> my back <S%H1460><s%> to the strikers, <S%H5221><s%> and my cheeks <S%H3895><s%> to those who plucked off <S%H4803><s%> the hair; <S%H5641><s%> I didn't hide my face <S%H6440><s%> from shame <S%H3639><s%> and spitting. <S%H7536><s%>

For the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> me; <S%H3637><s%> therefore I have not been confounded: therefore have I set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> like a flint, <S%H2496><s%> and I know <S%H3045><s%> that I shall not be disappointed. <S%H954><s%>

He is near <S%H7138><s%> who justifies <S%H6663><s%> me; <S%H7378><s%> who will bring charges against me? <S%H5975><s%> Let us stand up together: <S%H3162><s%> who is my adversary? <S%H1167><s%> Let him come near to me. <S%H5066><s%>

Behold, <S%H136><s%> the Lord Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> me; <S%H7561><s%> who is he who shall condemn me? <S%H1086><s%> Behold, all they shall wax old as a garment, <S%H899><s%> the moth <S%H6211><s%> shall eat them up. <S%H398><s%>

Who is among you who fears <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who obeys <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his servant? <S%H5650><s%> He who walks <S%H1980><s%> in darkness, <S%H2825><s%> and has no light, <S%H5051><s%> let him trust <S%H982><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and rely <S%H8172><s%> on his God. <S%H430><s%>

Behold, <S%H6919><s%> all you who kindle a fire, <S%H784><s%> who adorn yourselves with torches <S%H2131><s%> around <S%H247><s%> yourselves; <S%H3212><s%> walk in the flame <S%H217><s%> of your fire, <S%H784><s%> and among the brands <S%H2131><s%> that you have kindled. <S%H1197><s%> You shall have this of my hand; <S%H3027><s%> you shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> in sorrow. <S%H4620><s%>
